marklogic.body: I'm going to go on a limb here and assume you don't have a PhD in cell biology.Â Dr. Blumberg's work is published in high impact, peer reviewed journals, such as those released by the Endocrine Society.Â Serious scientists?Â Yeah, I'd say so.Â You may think that "obesogen" is a funny word, but you can't argue with a chemical that causes pre fat cells to accumulate more lipid, and causes animals exposed to these chemicals to Gain more fat mass.Â It's real, and it's scary.Â Does it mean you should continue to eat cheeseburgers?Â No.Â Does it mean you should wonder about chemicals you're exposed to, the plastics you use to Heat up your food, or the pesticides on your vegetables?Â Yes.
